scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a pregnant woman, nude and with long blonde hair, standing in water. She is holding a white cloth. To the left, within an architectural structure, a crowned king with a white beard and a blue robe is looking towards the woman. He holds a scepter. Behind him, other figures are partially visible. The background features a lush garden with flowering plants and trees, and in the distance, a city with spires. A decorative column with a grotesque head is positioned between the king and the woman.
